Package uk.ac.ed.inf

Class AStarSearch

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.AStarSearch
public class AStarSearch extends Object
This class is used to find the path that the drone should take going between any two points using a weighted A* (A star) search algorithm.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static Node
    endNode
    This stores the object of the type Node for the endpoint when the A Star search reaches the destination.
    final long
    PROGRAM_START_TIME
    This final long variable stores the start time of the program which would be utilised when we compute the ticks.

  • Constructor Details

    • AStarSearch

      public AStarSearch()

  • Method Details

    • getPathBack

      public List<Node> getPathBack()
      This method backtracks once the path going to a desired destination is found. It does so in order to get the moves made by the drone (the angle the drone moves in, the start and end point of each move, the ticks taken in that move.
      Returns:
      The list of Nodes that depicts the entire path taken in order to get to the destination. The first element in this would be the start point when looking for the path. And the last element would be a location close to the destination.

    • pathFindingAlgorithm

      public Node pathFindingAlgorithm(LngLat startLocation, Node goal)
      This method finds the path the drone should take when getting to the destination starting from a given location. The implementation of the algorithm was inspired by the GitHub Repo: A Star Search Algorithm, Java Implementation
      Parameters:
      startLocation - The location that the drone starts from while finding the path to the destination.
      goal - The Node depicting the destination that the drone attempts to get to.
      Returns:
      The node that is a location close to the destination that the drone attempted to get to.
